itunes:title: Episode 359 - Hi Everybody, I'm Bert Kuntz!
title: Episode 359 - Hi Everybody, I'm Bert Kuntz!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson sits down with OG Drinkin' Bro and audience favorite, Bison Union CEO Bert Kuntz, to talk about a possible new tv career, why he decided to pick up everything and move to Wyoming, and how the death of his father influenced his blossoming b...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson sits down with OG Drinkin' Bro and audience favorite, Bison Union CEO Bert Kuntz, to talk about a possible new tv career, why he decided to pick up everything and move to Wyoming, and how the death of his father influenced his blossoming business. Don't forget to keep tagging Bert with #bertfromtv on every social media outlet. He loves it.
